Backed by some of the most influential Bitcoin researchers in the world, Mark and Adam Levitt have published their book, "Bitcoin: The Next Big Thing," in the New York Times.

They point out that, as a general rule, the best ways to use Bitcoin in the long run are to use it to buy or sell goods and services. But they also point out that many of the innovations they call "blockchain" technologies could be used to make the system more secure
